name: SecureEnclave
desc: A representation of a device’s hardware-based key manager.

items.name: static var isAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that’s true if the device supports Secure Enclave access.

items.name: enum SecureEnclave.P256
items.desc: An elliptic curve that enables NIST P-256 signatures and key agreement within the Secure Enclave.
